version_description:
- Fixed an image leak in Caspian 1
- Updated terms

Update 2.5.2:
We love your DMs, keep sending us feedback on IG! We are coming up with some really incredible updates soon.

For this update, we are adding 6 free Astra frames that are designed to better fit landscape pictures. Enjoy!

v2.6: **Major Update**
- Text is finally here! Enjoy 7 beautiful fonts right away.
- Time-limited Christmas Series is also here in this update, use it while it's here!

*The Soleil Update*
Introducing the Soleil Film Series, 20 handcrafted frames inspired by studio darkrooms & late nights out.

*Upgrades & Improvements*
- 4 new beautiful fonts to design with [Marbella, Dresden, Manhattan & Vancouver]
- Optimised our image export quality: 2020 Vision is here thanks to your feedback.
- Improved text positioning on certain frames.

Thank you for all your kind and lovely feedback, please keep the DMs coming @auroraavocado, we love to hear from you.

Love,
Two Fellow Humans from Aurora

* The Blanc Update *
Introducing the Blanc Post Series, 12 handcrafted frames that are designed to be clean and easy to use for permanent posts.

* Updates to Eden & Caspian *
We have added 8 frames, 4 each to Eden & Caspian for all Club Members, enjoy!

Thank you all for your kind and lovely feedback, please keep the DMs coming @theauroraclub, we love to hear from you.

Stay safe and healthy, we'll all be back in the sunlight soon!

Love,
Two Fellow Humans From Aurora

* The Sticker Update *
Finally introducing stickers into the world of Aurora, with over 200 handcrafted stickers that you can play with.

More than 100 stickers are free-to-use for the community! Thanks for all your love and support so far.

* Updates to Fonts *
We have added 8 fonts for all club members, enjoy!

Thank you all for your kind and lovely feedback, please keep the DMs coming @theauroraclub, we love to hear from you.

Stay safe and healthy, we'll all be back in the sunlight soon!

Love,
Two Fellow Humans From Aurora

P.S. We also fixed a bug where the last four series could not be accessed, thanks to the Apple Developer team for helping us out!

* Bug Fixes*

Thanks to everyone for your reports on app crashing and missing images.

We have quickly fixed the bugs and the crashes should not occur anymore.

Love,
Two Fellow Humans from Aurora

* The All-New Lassen*
Lassen was Aurora's very first film series, which we have now totally revamped into a beautiful series of modern, realistic film designs.

*Sticker Colors*
Color your favorite stickers into any color you like with the new sticker color tool. Available on most sticker design packs, simply double tap a sticker to change its color.

*Eyedropper Tool*
Pick colours directly from your pictures and create beautiful designs with consistent color tones. Now available on stickers, text and backgrounds for all club members to enjoy.

*General Bug Fixes*
We've continued to fix little bugs that pop up here and there to make sure everyone can use Aurora smoothly and easily.

Thanks for all your lovely support, beautiful things are coming to Aurora soon!

Love,
Two Fellow Humans from Aurora

* Introducing The Messina Series *
We took our butts down to the local art store, bought a bunch of thick art paper to tear up and scan.
Enjoy 16 unique designs that makes you feel just a little bit more grounded, made with all our love.

*General Bug Fixes*
We've continued to fix little bugs that pop up here and there to make sure everyone can use Aurora smoothly and easily.

Thanks for all your lovely support, beautiful things are coming to Aurora soon!

Love,
Two Fellow Humans from Aurora

*Introducing Canvas: Our Biggest Update So Far *
We've finally realised our dream of giving you total layout customisation in Aurora.
You can now create any layout and design that you can dream of in Canvas mode.

This new design flexibility comes with a whole world of design assets that give you near unlimited possibilities in what kind of designs you can create.

We're really excited to see what you can come up with, from simple designs to more complex designs that really show your personality through your stories and memories.

Some of the new key updates:
- Crop Modes
- Image Frames
- Realistic Overlays (Shadows, Light, Dust & Grain)
- Versatile Blend Modes
- Customise Overlay Orientation
- Easy Layering Tool
- All New Background Textures
- New Fonts
- New Stickers
- Share Directly To Social Media
- Improved Export Resolution

*General Bug Fixes*
We've continued to fix little bugs that pop up here and there to make sure everyone can use Aurora smoothly and easily.

Thanks for all your lovely support, more beautiful things are coming to Aurora soon!

Love,
Two Fellow Humans from Aurora
